title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\SetLegacyAbacRequest
name: SetLegacyAbacRequest
description:
SetLegacyAbacRequest enables or disables the ABAC authorization mechanism for a cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.SetLegacyAbacRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Deprecated. The Google Developers Console project ID or project number. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the cluster resides. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the cluster to update. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.enabled
params.description: Required. Whether ABAC authorization will be enabled in the cluster.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name (project, location, cluster name) of the cluster to set legacy abac. Specified in the format projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*.
